DOC.brief_summary: This phase 3 , open-label , randomize study evaluate safety efficacy Lilly/Alkermes inhale insulin system compare injected pre-meal insulin non-smoking patient type 1 diabetes . Patients treat 24 month 2-month follow-up period .
DOC.brief_title: Study Human Insulin Inhalation Powder Patients With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes Non smoker Normal lung function Significant pulmonary , hepatic , renal disease Severe congestive heart failure Active malignancy Systemic glucocorticoid therapy
